title: Poslah Nodemon Executor
description: Runs a script using nodemon, based on its CLI options.

script.description: The script to run if 'exec' is not specified (e.g., 'server.js').

exec.description: The command to execute (e.g., 'ts-node app.ts'). Takes precedence over 'script'.

scriptArgs.description: Arguments to pass to the script itself.

watch.description: Paths to watch for changes. Use once for each path.

ignore.description: File patterns or directories to ignore.

ext.description: Comma-separated list of file extensions to watch (e.g., 'js,pug,hbs').

config.description: Path to an alternate nodemon.json config file.

verbose.description: Show detail on what is causing restarts.

cwd.description: The working directory to run nodemon from. It will be created if it doesn't exist.

runner.description: The package runner to use for executing the command (e.g., 'yarn', 'npx', 'pnpm').
